content: That's really helpful, thanks! I was thinking of having a pretty laid-back vibe, so I think I'll go with some classic barbecue sides like coleslaw and baked beans. And for dessert, I think I'll set up a s'mores station - who doesn't love s'mores, right? By the way, speaking of laid-back vibes, our lake house trip was really relaxed, too. We spent Saturday morning lounging by the lake, playing board games, and having a big barbecue lunch. It was perfect.
